text: Norbert Pieter Marie Klein (1 March 1956 â€“ 1 September 2021) was a Dutch politician. He was a member of 50PLUS. He was an MP between 20 September 2012 to 23 March 2017. He was born in Hengelo, Netherlands. Klein died on 1 September 2021 in Hoevelaken, Netherlands at the age of 65.Oud-Kamerlid Norbert Klein (50Plus) overleden ==References== ==Other websites== * Parlement.com biography Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Dutch councillors Category:Dutch provincial politicians Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:People from Hengelo Category:People's Party for Freedom and Democracy politicians Category:Politicians from Overijssel
title: Norbert Klein (politician)
